Study Cards Lab: Interactive Flashcards & Learning Tracker

- Single-page web app with a clean, card-based interface displaying flashcards for study.
- Users can create, edit, and delete flashcards containing question and answer fields.
- Cards are presented one at a time with keyboard navigation (arrow keys) to flip card (show question/answer) and move between cards.
- Drag-and-drop support to reorder cards within the deck.
- Ability to mark cards as “Learned” or “To Review” with quick toggling using keyboard shortcuts.
- Progress tracker showing how many cards are learned vs total, updated live.
- Print-friendly view that formats the entire deck as a neat list of questions and answers for offline study.
- Persistent storage using localStorage to save decks, card order, and progress across sessions.
- Sticky header with deck controls (add card, print, reset progress) always visible while scrolling.
- Responsive layout that works well on desktop and mobile.
- Accessible ARIA roles and keyboard focus management for full keyboard usability.
